about_the_game:
Gather a party of four adventurers and explore the Lands of Alsinar, a fantasy realm offering multiple key missions and side quests. Battle vicious monsters, discover powerful artifacts, and seek help from allies to destroy those in your way. Take vengeance on enemies who razed your home city and unravel the evil plot behind the land's troubles.

Key features:


  • Freedom of exploration
    Wardens of Chaos has minimal linearity, allowing you to go anywhere and undertake quests within your capabilities. The game features outdoor locations and numerous dungeons where you can battle monsters and acquire powerful loot.
  • Customize characters
    Choose four characters from a list of ten classes and learn spells from various magic schools and martial art disciplines.
  • Character development
    The game offers nine magic schools and numerous martial art skills. Gain experience through battles and quests, convert experience into skill points, and enhance character skills by allocating points to corresponding magic or martial skills. Magic skills have five tiers: Novice, Apprentice, Expert, Master, and Grand Master.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Wardens of Chaos, a real-time party-based RPG inspired by classics. Travel to diverse locations, visit interesting cities, master skills, and fight hordes of monsters. Uncover conspiracies as you strive to save the world from impending doom in this thrilling adventure.
